thread.title: Winners of national essay competition among school students awarded at President's Administration
thread.title_full: Winners of national essay competition among school students awarded at President's Administration

title: Winners of national essay competition among school students awarded at President's Administration
text:
AKIPRESS.COM - On behalf of the President, Chairman of the Cabinet of Ministers Adylbek Kasymaliev presented awards to the winners of the national essay competition "I know my labor rights", held among students in grades 9-11, the press service of the Cabinet of Ministers reported on June 12.
The competition, dedicated to protecting the labor rights of children, was organized by the Secretariat of the Commissioner for Children's Rights together with the Federation of Labor Unions of Kyrgyzstan with the assistance of the F. Ebert Foundation in Kyrgyzstan. More than 2,400 school students from all over the country took part in it.
The best works were selected by a special commission. Adylbek Kasymaliev congratulated the winners and presented them with laptops, tablets, phones and e-books on behalf of President Sadyr Japarov.
The Chairman of the Cabinet of Ministers emphasized the importance of knowing labor rights from an early age, noting that this is the key to a successful future.
